name: Ice Cream Poll
description: A poll about everyone's favorite frozen treat.

questions.text: What is your all-time favorite ice cream flavor and why?
Toppings or no toppings? What are your go-to toppings?
Cup or cone? If cone, what kind (waffle, sugar, cake)?
What's the most unusual ice cream flavor you've ever tried?
If you could invent a new ice cream flavor, what would it be?

name: Cars Poll
description: A poll to discuss all things automotive.

questions.text: What was your first car, or what do you dream your first car will be?
If you could own any car in the world, regardless of price, what would it be?
Electric, hybrid, or gasoline-powered cars: what's your preference and why?
What's the most important feature you look for in a car?
What's your favorite road trip you've ever taken in a car?

name: Sports Poll
description: Let's talk about the wide world of sports.

questions.text: What is your favorite sport to watch, and which team do you root for?
What is your favorite sport to play?
Who do you consider the greatest athlete of all time in any sport?
What is the most exciting sporting event you have ever attended?
If you could be a professional athlete for a day, which sport would you choose?

name: Dating Poll
description: A discussion about modern dating and relationships.

questions.text: What makes for a perfect first date?
What is the biggest 'deal-breaker' for you in a relationship?
What qualities do you value most in a partner?
What's the best piece of dating advice you've ever received?
Online dating apps: a great tool or a source of frustration? Share your thoughts.
What was your favorite subject in school and why?
Who was your most memorable teacher and what made them stand out?
What is one thing you wish you had learned in school that wasn't taught?
What's your best study tip?
What was your favorite school-related extracurricular activity?

name: Pets Poll
description: A poll for all the animal lovers out there.

questions.text: Are you a dog person, a cat person, or something else entirely?
What's the funniest thing your pet has ever done?
If you could have any animal as a pet (real or mythical), what would it be?
What's the best name you've ever heard for a pet?
Share a favorite memory of a pet you've had.

name: Desserts Poll
description: A sweet discussion about our favorite desserts.

questions.text: If you could only eat one dessert for the rest of your life, what would it be?
Chocolate or fruit-based desserts: which do you prefer?
What is your favorite dessert to make at home?
What's the best dessert you've ever had at a restaurant?
Is there a dessert you dislike that most people seem to love?

name: Food Poll
description: A general discussion about all things food.

questions.text: What is your ultimate comfort food?
If you had to eat one type of cuisine for a year, what would you choose?
What's a food you think is overrated?
What's the most adventurous thing you've ever eaten?
Sweet or savory breakfast? What's your go-to?

name: Music Poll
description: Let's talk about the music that moves us.

questions.text: What's a song that always puts you in a good mood?
Who is an artist or band you think everyone should listen to at least once?
What was the first concert you ever attended?
If you could create a soundtrack for your life, what's one song that would have to be on it?
Live music or studio recordings: what's your preference and why?

name: Vacation Poll
description: A poll about our dream getaways and travel experiences.

questions.text: What is your dream vacation destination?
Relaxing on a beach or exploring a new city: what's your ideal vacation style?
What's the most memorable trip you've ever taken?
What's one travel tip you swear by?
If you could take a year-long sabbatical to travel, where would you go?
